content.p: The School of Psychology is committed to promoting an environment embracing equality and diversity. People and Culture Moodle (staff and students) The School of Psychology received its first Athena SWAN Silver award in 2008. This was successfully renewed in 2012 and 2017. Athena SWAN recognises good practice in advancement of gender equality in higher education and research. In addition to the University's Equality and Diversity policies, the School of Psychology also offers: Equality and Diversity Strategy Policies and Information Complaints, Grievance and Dignity Widening Participation Anne McLaren and Nottingham Research Fellowship Scheme Chaplaincy and Faith Support LGBTQ staff network Athena SWAN Race Equality Charter Stonewall UK Forum for Responsible Research Metrics University Park The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD For all enquires please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
